body:
The result of my radiation analysis appears totally sprenkled and rough (--> images). Changing distance from base or grid didn't do the trick. I used very simple elements for my geometry, mostly solids. Nonetheless, the result is not very satisfying.

What's the reason for this?
topic: Why does my solar radiation analysis looks sprenkled?

replies.body: Thanks for your reply! I tried that, down till it crashed but it didn't really get much better.

Maybe you should hide the surfaces you are analyzing, so only the calculated surfaces are shown ...?

-A.

that did the trick, thanks a lot!

And sorry for asking about such a beginner issue. : /
